pr_title: [Issue 8093]Fix client lookup hangs when broker restarts

timeline.bodyText: Thanks for the great contribution, I think it's better to return a retryable exception to the client? So that the client can reconnect later. Does this make sense?
timeline.author: codelipenghui

replies.bodyText: As discussed with @4onni, this will resultin a client lookup timeout, and the client will relookup later, so it's not a problem here.
replies.author: codelipenghui
